channel.title: Problem
channel.description: Alright well I have a problem, I have my No-IP Duc setup running, I have my server on, however when I try to put my server on the server status page it says its offline? I might know what the problem is but am verifying to see if it could be something else. My IP changes sometimes because of my internet providers could it be that I have to port-forward every time that my IP updates? Or what else could it be. Help appreciated.

item.title: Problem
item.dc:creator: @Tai1 Tai`
item.description:
@Tai1 wrote:

Yeah, I had my server up for like two months, it went down and I just found out that it was because if your router restarts you have to port-forward again. Eh, servers get boringâ€¦

Read full topic

item.title: Problem
item.dc:creator: @Ibehustlin247 Ibehustlin247
item.description:
@Ibehustlin247 wrote:

Yeah, at first it worked then it wouldnt let them. Im guessing my router probably restarted and I need to get it port -forwarded. Thanks for the help.

Read full topic

item.title: Problem
item.dc:creator: @Tai1 Tai`
item.description:
@Tai1 wrote:

No, but you have to port forward everytime your router restarts, Have you had anyone try your server before you tried? to make sure it is REALLY up?

Read full topic
